availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p: It is ordered that private Henry C Bumgardner of the 30" Kentucky Volunteer Militia be discharged the service of the State of Kentucky from the date of this order by reason of Surgeons Certificate of General debility and Constitutional infirmity

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
